nav.title: Navigation Demo (5 Pages)
nav.subTitle: Four-grid to enter sub-pages, top-left return

a.title: Info A
a.body: This is the first section of info (for demo switching).

b.title: Info B
b.body: This is the second section. Use Left/Right to switch.

c.title: Info C
c.body: This is the third section. Dots indicate the current page.

d.title: Info D
d.body: This is the fourth section. A simple info page example.

e.title: Info E
e.body: This is the fifth section. Switching loops around.

p3.title: Page 3 - Control List
p3.hint:
Hint: This page's controls are vertically arranged, and the container is scrollable.
All operable controls are marked with groupType.

p4.title: Page 4 - 60s Countdown Progress Circle (Circular Progress Bar)
